title: So about Sejuani.
body: Can we revert a few of the nerfs now that all the items that made her strong have been nerfed? Save {{champion:113}}

replies.body: Nerfed Cinderhulk. Nerfed her damage and utility. Nerfed armor. But keep Sated devourer untouched and continue to nerf tanks. Rito Logic.
You forgot that the only nerf given to any Sated user was taking 5 AD from Kayle.

Also, Lee Sin is STILL getting played in LPL, LCK, and NA LCS on 5.15 on occasion, and he gets a buff to his ultimate with NO trade-off anywhere in his kit, and simultaneously, all counter-items are nerfed.

"We just want to lower his skillcap, and this is not a buff" only works if you offset the buff with a nerf to make it a skillcap-lowering net neutral change.  OTHERWISE IT'S A STRAIGHT-UP BUFF.

Rito, don't grow your nose too much.  You will run into things a lot.

**EDIT:**  I meant "skill floor" instead of "skillcap".  The argument is 100% exactly the same otherwise, and the rebuttals are 100% nonsense.
good job, I think you know what skill floor lowering is. they didn't change his skill cap at all, st high elos he is the same, he is just better at lower elo.
its still a straight up numbers buff...

ikr?  The only way that a buff could *only* affect everyone *except* the LCS would be this:

"Lee Sin's ult does (what it used to do) + (20 damage per player's division below LCS)"

That would at least keep Mr. Bigplays out of Worlds for once.  Of course, this would make the smurfing even more hilariosly awful, and I'm not suggesting it.  I still say, "fine, if this buff is easy to leverage in Bronze, take away something that gets more use in Diamond+".
yea i personally cant stand watching lee sin in competitive. idk y for some reason im just not entertained by him at all.
Maybe it has to do with the silly ''Lee Sin outplayz Ashe!!1!!'' videos. Lee Sin was entertaining in S2-3. Now its like ''another insect? bah''.
its not just the numbers, its which numbers.  I guess if you haven't ever worked on something like this, I guess there is no way to explain it.

Lmao i challenge you to give me an example of buffing someones bad players without touching their good players. Regardless, this is definitely not that situation. 

 its a buff aimed at shitty lee sins but if you honestly think it doesnt help out the good lee sins at all then you are fooling yourself. It leaves him more options open, now he has better wombo potential with his ult. Yea, thats something a noob lee sin would do, but now a good lee sin has those extra opportunities to win an entire team fight off his ult. 

If orianna had her CD refunded for missing her ult, yea that would help out the crappy oriannas, but it would also buff the good ones.

Not to mention is does a shit=ton of damage and is also INDEED a buff, now Lee Sin has more options late game, 21% of tanks health onto a carry is fucking insane, add that too if Lee SIn built damage and you literally 100%-25% squishies if you kick a tank into them -personal experiences-

And Sejuani is left in the dust which really sucks they nerfed Cinderhulk so that its not for late game now Sejuani has shit early and shit late BASICALLY making her an ult bot which fucking feels terrible :/

Seriously, they first nerfed her ult... then they destroyed her "W". Also, one of her best first buy items, Frozen Heart was also nerfed too. Not including all the nerfs to other armor items and the cinderhulk change was just the icing on the cake! I swear, Riot quickly changed their minds on the whole tank meta we had...

i remember when cinderhulk was really strong
her W got nerfed on like every single patch

Is Ghostcrawler on the balance team?

Rito took a huge hot dump on tanks this season. Sated is the only defence left against the jugger meta
{{champion:14}}   Agrees with this sentiment especially the nerfed the cinderhulk enchant _again_.
As a Sion Main i approve!

In a similar topic, Riot Repertoir seemed to suggest that it's not really on their radar.

"However, if it's just that the Devourer-dominated solo queue meta doesn't favor her at the moment, that's probably less a reason to adjust her, since we can sometimes get into trouble for buffing champions into a meta they don't really fit in with."

Why she didn't get any of the "Base Statistic Compensation" for tanks in 5.16 is beyond me. Naut, Rammus and Amumu all did. Sej though? Nope.

Same thing with WW please?

I do know he's pretty strong with sated devourer, but he still recieved alot of nerfs with old jungle item (which was also nerfed)

Warwick isn't effected by the cinderhulk nerf and his winrate is already above average for a jungler.  He's literally in the top 5 junglers by winrate right now.  http://champion.gg/statistics/#?sortBy=general.winPercent&order=descend&roleSort=Jungle

Warwick lost 40% of the duration of his W
Warwick lost damage on his ult and it also got an increased cooldown

All because of red smite and old devourer (and both got nerfed as least as far as Warwick was concerned)

He was nerfed with old devourer which stacked with his ultimate.

Thus he was nerfed. And after that devourer was nerfed making WW into total meh champion.

Yes, I know WW isn't weak, but right now he's getting carried by current devourers power. Once it'll be nerfed then WW will mostly cease to exist...

I would say in general, Sejuani doesn't slow enough and doesn't do enough damage.

People like to call her a tank, but her only "tank" ability is on her passive and it's a 10-25 armor bonus. Compared to other tanks her actual tankiness is quite low, the flip side of this is that she used to do more damage than other tanks making her more of an AP fighter than a full tank. However now that her damage is lower, she is doing tank level damage without the tank level tankyness.

Q has been a short knockup for about a year now.  Only a half second or something like that, but it stops channels, which is really important, and is enough to start a CC chain with good enough reaction times.

She's nowhere near Leona on spamable CC, but her ult is more teamfight-turning, even if the cooldown is longer.

She's a bit more DPSy, and she gets indirect tank power by her health scaling damage on W; the DoT used to have lousy health scaling, and her Q used to just do %enemy health, so she was in a really weird place, but now health scaling is back in fashion again.  So she's only tanky because of base stats and the items she *has* to buy, but she can't be the tankiest of tanks even if she tries because the lack of steroids.

So she's kind of a weird zoning tank with a very important clutch ultimate.  Blow the ult, and you might have a really bad time.  She can flank with the leap if something good happens or hop away if it turns sour.

I think she's actually kind of tricky.  It only took a bit of Cinderhulk love to make her really strong, but she's fallen off some since then.  At least you can play her now that she's not permaban.

Sejuani strategy for 5.17 is to hide in the jungle until you get to 6. Use it on bot lane, then hide again until it comes back up again. Continue doing this all game as you are merely a walking ultimate. I think if they nerfed her damage anymore she would be healing the other team.
revert the nerfs to her w damage plz her early clears make me wanna slit my wrists
She's still really good. Tons of cc and disruption, and it wasnt really fair for her to have that damage on top.

> [{quoted}](name=Totalis,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FEjiQVVT,comment-id=001e,timestamp=2015-08-25T18:19:47.080+0000)
>
> She's still really good. Tons of cc and disruption, and it wasnt really fair for her to have that damage on top.

You would be right if not for the fact that she has no innate tankiness. You know, for a TANK.

[](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Base_champion_statistics)

What do you even consider innate tankiness? Because yes she does, more than most actually. So I mean, were you just talking out your ass? cause it looks that way to me...

Totally agree 50% of being a tank is items and 50% is the champions, CC and Durability is also a huge factor in being a tank
Tanks have CC so they can do CC things and ALSO take less damage and than the durability as you mentioned before, something thats CC'd can't hit you! And it sucks so much for Sejuani they nerfed her HARD after Cinderhulk and now that the CInderhulk meta isn't really here, tank items are being nerfed she fucking sucks and its really BS that Riot hasn't done anything yet.... Also knowing that Worlds is coming up they aren't gonna be doing shit until afterwards maybe... == It just really pisses me off Sejuani is one of my favourite champions and I can't even play her knowing that I'm literally going into a game at a disadvantage for picking her... Sejuani does have an insane ultimate but making her an ult bot like Annie (support) is fucking lame and really lame gameplay wise knowing that if I don't get those ultimates its not even worth picking Sejuani...

>Tons of cc and disruption, and it wasnt really fair for her to have that damage on top.

Just throwing this out there, Naut has more CC and disruption and is tankier, Sej has to bring something that he doesn't.

All she has over him is damage, she has a better clear speed, but that's because of her damage.
I just hate how people in bronze continue to ban her instead of Yi lmao.
but Yi is terrible.
In Bronze he is god. Remember in Bronze no one picks CC, only FotM assassins in Top/Mid/Jg.

Her state now reminds me of how she was before season 5. I wouldn't say she's as bad, but her early clear is back to being bad, she's back to being ult reliant, and back to having little pressure pre-6. I was happy to see her in a good state, but there's no reason to pick her over amumu like before :/.
Save {{champion:266}} too while you're at it!!

aatrox is like
either he get behind and isnt anything special
or gets ahead and dominates your team

LCS.

Tanks.

There can be only one.
{{champion:79}} Ohhhh yeahhhh! *glug glug glug*
Getting nerfed next patch: pretty much in the same boat as Sejuani honestly.
The Grag nerf isn't that bad. Grag's a strong pick because he's a tank who can trade early and doesn't just get bullied around like Sej does. The nerfs on the PBE don't change that.

Can she get something that actually makes her a tank? I mean Graves gets passive armor and MR, but he's not being slapped with the tank label is he?

zz

They also didn't touch her armor per level despite buffing it for almost every other tank.

Feels like they're really trying to bury her.

I remember before cinderhulk when she was rarely picked at all. Since then she's only been nerfed. Not even a remotely viable pick toplane and a mediocre jungler.

I would go so far as to say there are 30 Junglers that most people would consider better than Sejuani right now.

Skarner, Kayle, Xin Zhao, Warwick, Elise, Diana, Amumu, Shyvana, Udyr, Nocturne, Jax, Fizz, Aatrox, Vi, Ekko, Rammus, Pantheon, Sion, Wukong, Evelynn, Volibear, rek'sai, nidalee, gragas, yi, nautilus, nunu, hecarim, maokai, Lee sin. 

I never play Rengar and Khazix so I am going to leave them out of the list because I don't feel confident in putting them there.
